column5: We Started out with Flipp'n Jigs Darcy wanted to get some practice in & I had 5 or so Bass on the Flipp'n Jigs & he had nothing so he switched to a Buzzbait & I'd catch another one & he'd go back to the Flipp'n Jig, as it was getting dark we both were threwing Buzzbaits & he wacked this Smallie 4' from the boat, we ended up with about 15 Bass & 1 Pike with me slightly ahead in number but this Smallie sure made up for that LOL Tight Lines SBK      21" Smallie on a Buzzbait
biggie! real healthy looking too. nice.
now that last one is a helluva TOAD
Dude lose the gay shorts  ahhhh , but what a pig , great small mouth HUGE .. but the shorts ??????? Must of been a real thrill when it hit ...
What a tank!!!  Got my biggest smallie last season on an early morning buzzbait....just an inch shy of that beast
Not sure what you mean the only time I'd use a Period (.) is if the story was over & this one will go on for awhile lol Tight Lines SBK.
Are you sure that's a smallmouth and not a whale? Holy CRAP!
LOL   Thats a real nice smallie.
.. and thats the biggest or at least one of the biggest smallmouths I have ever seen posted on this site and to get it in the dark on a buzzer ... PRICELESS
